Dance [/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ specialty=”off” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” background_size=”contain” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_end=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” next_background_color=”#0f0f0f” disabled=”off” disabled_on=”on|on|” prev_background_color=”#000000″ inner_width=”auto” inner_max_width=”none”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/dancers-border.png” background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” module_class=”box-img-right” module_class_1=”overlay-text” width=”80%” max_width=”1080px”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Dance Training” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” header_2_text_color=”#ef3caf”]

Dance Training

Work with the biggest and best choreographers in the business who have worked on Disney shows like “The Descendants” to “So You Think You Can Dance.” These choreographers make you look good and finalize your image. Whether you dance or not, your stage presence and confidence is a must in order to succeed in any area of the music industry.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Learn More” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”#dance” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-purple” animation_style=”zoom” /][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ specialty=”off” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_end=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” next_background_color=”#333333″ disabled=”off” disabled_on=”||on” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/dancers.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” prev_background_color=”#0f0f0f” inner_width=”auto” inner_max_width=”none”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” background_color=”rgba(51,51,51,0.82)” make_fullwidth=”on” use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ custom_padding=”75px|20px|75px|20px” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth et_pb_row_fullwidth” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Dance Training” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” header_2_text_color=”#ef3caf” text_orientation=”center”]

Dance Training

Work with the biggest and best choreographers in the business who have worked on Disney shows like “The Descendants” to “So You Think You Can Dance.” These choreographers make you look good and finalize your image. Whether you dance or not, your stage presence and confidence is a must in order to succeed in any area of the music industry.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Learn More” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”#dance” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”bg-purple” animation_style=”zoom” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#0f0f0f” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_color=”#333333″ module_class=”full-screen” module_id=”dance” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/scrollingbanner.jpg” animation_style=”fade” inner_width=”auto” inner_max_width=”none”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”2_5″][et_pb_image _builder_version=”3.19.10″ src=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Paul-Becker.jpg” module_class=”img-gray” alt=”Paul Becker” animation_style=”flip” animation_delay=”700ms” /][et_pb_video _builder_version=”3.22.7″ src=”/wp-content/uploads/Paul-Becker-2018-Choreography.mp4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ image_src=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/video-slide-paul.jpg” /][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Paul Becker” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ background_layout=”dark” header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_delay=”800ms”]

Paul Becker

Our head choreographer, Paul Becker, is a trusted friend and the go-to collaborator for many of Hollywood’s biggest productions. Paul has worked closely with everyone from Katy Perry, and Ariana Grande to Miley Cyrus, The Jonas Brothers, The Muppets, Michael Buble, Ciara — even directing for Kanye West.

Becker is content with letting his body of work speak for itself. And what an impressive body of work it is. From choreographing over 300 film and tv projects, like the recent “Wreck-It Ralph 2” for Disney Animation, CW’s “Charmed”, “Goodboys” for Universal, and “Valley Of the Boom” coming to NatGeo this year.

His past works include: “Twilight”, “Mirror Mirror,” and Zack Snyder’s “Sucker Punch” to “Diary of a Wimpy Kid 1-3”. He is also currently the series choreographer for “A Series of Unfortunate Events” (Netflix), “Once Upon” a Time” (ABC), CW’s hit show “Riverdale”, and SyFy’s “The Magicians”. He also did choreography directing for “Deadpool 2” (Fox) and the remake of “Overboard” for MGM.

Becker recently was nominated for the World Choreography Award for his work with his mentor, famed director Kenny Ortega, as his choreography partner for Disney Channel’s mega hit musical “Descendants” starring Dove Cameron.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button _builder_version=”3.19.10″ button_text=”Signup For Our Dance Audition Today!” button_url=”/audition-form/” module_class=”bg-blue” button_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”900ms” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
